prepareTarget

protected void prepareTarget(TargetNode targetNode,
                             java.sql.ResultSet rs)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                             java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                             LigretoException
This function will prepare the target and could do the following:
  • drop the table if it should be re-created
  • create the table according the result set
  • truncate the already existing table
  • generate the insert statement for the transfer

Parameters:
targetNode - The description of the target from the parser.
rs - The result set of the source query.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
LigretoException
